column1: [Highlight] Kent Bazemore mocking Kawhi after getting called for a foul
Kent Bazemore today: 26 points,8 rebounds,3 assists,3 steals on 10-19 and 4-7 from three and 2 clutch overtime offensive rebounds

Warriors PR: “The Warriors have four 20-point scorers in the same game (Kent Bazemore, Stephen Curry, Kelly Oubre Jr., Andrew Wiggins) for the first time since Nov. 23, 2016 vs. the Lakers (Curry, Kevin Durant, Klay Thompson, Ian Clark)”
[Kent Bazemore] A leader puts everything on the line for his team. We wouldn’t be us without him either. Boy got three rings. We will pick you up bro! @Money23Green #Since12
[Post Game Thread] Golden State Warriors (16-13) come back to defeat Miami Heat (11-17) by 120 - 112 in OT behind 26 points from Kent Bazemore from the bench
[Highlight] Kent Bazemore hits the game-tying layup that helps send the game to OT in the Bay

These are the best defensive players in the league this year, according to the LEBRON metric, minimum 500 minutes played. Demarcus Cousins and Kent Bazemore are interesting inclusions. Larry Nance Jr. comes in as the 4th best defender in the league.

[Slater] Kent Bazemore on Klay/Steph/Draymond: "It's a hard pill for them to swallow. We talking about, these guys, five straight Finals appearances. This is, by any means, not acceptable by them at all. This hurts them more than anything. Klay was fired up after the game."

[Slater] Kent Bazemore on Klay/Steph/Draymond: "It's a hard pill for them to swallow. We talking about, these guys, five straight Finals appearances. This is, by any means, not acceptable by them at all. This hurts them more than anything. Klay was fired up after the game."

[Poole] Kent Bazemore, marveling at teammate Stephen Curry: “49 points in 29 minutes, that’s unreal. We got guys hurting hamstrings to keep up.” Curry leads NBA in scoring, at 31.9 ppg Bradley Beal is second, at 31.4, but will miss at least 2 games with, yes, a strained hammy.

[Slater] The expected absence for Kent Bazemore will be seven days, I’m told, which is typical for health and safety contact tracing. That’d knock him out of the Warriors’ entire homestand vs Nuggets, Kings and Mavericks.

[Shiller] Kent Bazemore on the Brad Beal stuff: "I guess you can't joke anymore. Whatever. I feel like I'm a pretty lighthearted guy. Hey man -- my loyalty is to SC30. It kind of got out of hand. I don't get involved with that crap."

[Medina] I'm told Kent Bazemore was offered more money from the Warriors than the Lakers. But Bazemore agreed to join the Lakers on a one-year deal because he views them as a title contender and is told he'll have a major role
[Shams] Free agent Kent Bazemore has agreed to a 1-year deal with the Lakers, agent Austin Walton tells @TheAthletic @Stadium.
Kent Bazemore on Steph Curry a few months ago: “If you want to know where my loyalty is, it’s to SC30. Anyone out there chasing him, it’s gonna be tough.”

The Lakers will spend $15M total on contracts of Malik Monk, Kendrick Nunn, Wayne Ellington, Carmelo Anthony, Kent Bazemore, Trevor Ariza, & Dwight Howard. The Knicks are gonna pay Evan Fournier $19.5M per yr.

With Nothing but Vet Mins/MLE and a Dream, the Lakers were able to add Kendrick Nunn, Malik Monk, Dwight Howard, Trevor Ariza, Kent Bazemore and Wayne Ellington to create a insanely talented supporting cast to surround Westbrook, Lebron James, and Anthony Davis

[Medina] I'm told Kent Bazemore was offered more money from the Warriors than the Lakers. But Bazemore agreed to join the Lakers on a one-year deal because he views them as a title contender and is told he'll have a major role.

[Trudell] With LeBron and Westbrook among those resting today vs. Brooklyn, here are the starters: Kendrick Nunn, Kent Bazemore, Talen Horton-Tucker, Anthony Davis and DeAndre Jordan AD, starting at the 4, will likely only play in the 1st Q.

Malik Monk, Kendrick Nunn, Wayne Ellington, Carmelo Anthony, Kent Bazemore, Trevor Ariza, and Dwight Howard combined for 28 points in the opener for the Lakers. Evan Fournier scored 32 in the opener for the Knicks.

[Goon] Kent Bazemore publicly expressed vaccine skepticism in March; today, he says he felt the vaccine was “forced on me” and he doesn’t respond well to that. He says Rob Pelinka talked to him about getting it. Bazemore said he has his first dose, he’ll get his second soon.
